Everything Everywhere All at Once

Animation

Spider-Man animatic

I dabble in hand-drawn animation sometimes as well. Here is Spider-Man fanart! It got 150k+ views on instagram

Struggling CS Major

#relatable, #funny, 700k+ views on instagram! my hobby lately is to draw anthropomorphic programming languages.

Sapphic Equestria Girls I Guess??

One of my most popular works (yeah i dont know why either). this is a piece with more lines and less colors, and it's more expressive i suppose!
